wikipedia_page.main: William Garfit (9 November 1840 – 29 October 1920) was an English banker and Conservative Party politician from the town of Boston in Lincolnshire. He held several local offices in Lincolnshire, and sat in the House of Commons from 1895 to 1906.

response: * William Garfit (1840–1920) banker and Conservative politician,Hansard 1803–2005: contributions in Parliament by William Garfit retrieved 19 January 2018 MP for Boston 1895 to 1906
